scikits.statsmodels.robust.norms.RamsayE.rho¶

RamsayE.rho(z)¶

The robust criterion function for Ramsay’s Ea.

Parameters:

z : array-like

1d array
Returns:

array :

rho(z) = a**-2 * (1 - exp(-a*|z|)*(1 + a*|z|))
